title: GTA Online: Money Fronts
headline: GTA Online: Money Fronts
subtitle: Mr. Faber Work
content:
Professional money laundering services are in high demand, and Mr. Faber’s clients are not patient people. Lend your problem solving expertise to the man behind scenes in Mr. Faber Work.

These operations will generate Heat for the business you launched from, so you’ll need to balance the scales accordingly with Legal activity.

Use the laptop inside any of your front businesses to launch these missions.
